mapper.select: select c.id course_id, c.course_name courseName, c.credit from tb_course c where c.id in (select a.course_id from tb_user_course_record a where a.user_id = #{userId} and score >= 60 group by course_id)

select c.id course_id, c.course_name courseName, c.credit from tb_course c where
c.id not in (select a.course_id from tb_user_course_record a where a.user_id = 1 and 60 > score group by course_id) and c.id in (select a.course_id from tb_user_course_record a where a.user_id = 1 group by course_id);
